gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
April 1st-Decadal Long Mean Rainfall. The APR1_LM grid data layer is comprised of 1152x1152 derivative raster precipitation features derived based on 8 kilometers data originally from EDC.
2nd and 3rd Decadal Rainfall from January to December are also available for download.
Acronyms and Abbreviations: EDC - USGS EROS (Earth Resources Observation Systems) Data Center

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: Interpolated rain gauge data for the period 1920 to 1980

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: FAO - Aquaculture Management and Conservation Service (FIMA)
FAO - Aquaculture Management and Conservation Service (FIMA)
FAO - Aquaculture Management and Conservation Service (FIMA)

gmd:supplementalInformation.gco:CharacterString: This map is part of two publications entitled: "Jenness, J.; Dooley, J.; Aguilar-Manjarrez, J.; Riva, C. African Water Resource Database. GIS-based tools for inland aquatic resource management. 1. Concepts and application case studies CIFA Technical Paper. No.33, Part 1. Rome, FAO. 2007. 167p. " "Jenness, J.; Dooley, J.; Aguilar-Manjarrez, J.; Riva, C. African Water Resource Database. GIS-based tools for inland aquatic resource management. 2. Technical manual and workbook. CIFA Technical Paper. No. 33, Part 2. Rome, FAO. 2007. 308 p." The primary AWRD interface, tool-sets and data integral to the function of the AWRD are distributed in two DVD's accompanying CIFA No. 33, Part 2, and are also available for download from FAO's GeoNetwork and GISFish GIS portals.

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: Data reformatted from BIL to Arc-Grid format to facilitate access to this resource by users for visualization and analysis via AWRD interface. In order to enhance the non-grid based capabilities of the AWRD, a polygonal and point representation of the base grid was translated into shapefile format in decimal degrees, followed by the creation of annual tables consolidating the data represented. .
